channel.title: tech on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Long Thoughts

item.title: Emacs Config Updates
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Highlights of recent config changes to my code editor, my text vehicle, my passion project: emacs.

item.title: Getting stuff done is not about getting stuff done
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: About the question whether doing a task is only about getting it done, and why there is no such thing as no progress.

item.title: Windows 10 vs Ubuntu 18
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: As of this month, Windows is still the dominating desktop / laptop OS globally with 88% market share. Windows for me - and for most users, has always been the default. However, coming back from a Linux environment I realized this: Windows is not that great of an OS.
